uk.co.edgeorgedev.notifj.notification

Class OSXGrowlNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.edgeorgedev.notifj.notification.OSXGrowlNotification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Notification

    public class OSXGrowlNotification
extends java.lang.Object
implements Notification
    This class consists of methods to create Growl Notification messages on the OS X platform

    The open() and show() methods of this class throw a NotificationException if the creation of a Growl Notification fails.

    It should also be noted that open() will throw a NotificationOperatingSystemException should it be called on a non-OSX operating system.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ed George
    See Also:
    Notification

    • Constructor Detail

      • OSXGrowlNotification

        public OSXGrowlNotification(java.lang.String application_name)
        Constructs an unregistered named Growl notification application

        The registration process occurs within the open() method.

        Parameters:
        application_name - name of application to be registered within Growl

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open()
          throws NotificationException
        Creates new ApppleScript Engine which is used to create notifications
        Specified by:
        open in interface Notification
        Throws:
        NotificationOperatingSystemException - if the system operating system is not Mac OSX
        NotificationException - if the setup required for creating notifications fails.

      • show

        public void show(java.lang.String title,
        java.lang.String message)
          throws NotificationException
        Displays a Growl Notification with a given title and message

        Should the application, specified by the application_name, not be registered within the Growl Notification settings, it is first registered before a message is displayed.

        As of Growl Version 2.1.3, this method correctly generates and displays notifications.

        Specified by:
        show in interface Notification
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the notification.
        message - the message body of the notification.
        Throws:
        NotificationException - if no Script Engine is available or no Growl process is running.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws NotificationException
        Cleans-up object by resetting the script engine and application name
        Specified by:
        close in interface Notification
        Throws:
        NotificationException - if the cleanup fails.

      • isGrowlEnabled

        public boolean isGrowlEnabled()
        Determines whether Growl Notifications are enabled on the machine
        Returns:
        true if Growl Notifications are enabled
